Datepicker

Use the datepicker component to allow a user to select a date in an intuitive way.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-datepicker

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-datepicker

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-datepicker/src/scss/datepicker";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Import JS

                  
                  import { Datepicker } from '@govflanders/vl-ui-datepicker';

Info and options

The datepicker has multiple attributes to modify date output, date selection, ... [data-vl-datepicker-format]: sets the date format. The attribute value is the format (default: "d.m.Y."). [data-vl-datepicker-selected-date]: sets a preselected date in the calendar. The attribute value is the requested date. [data-vl-datepicker-min-date] and [data-vl-datepicker-max-date]: set an earliest and/or latest date(s). The attribute value is the required date. [data-vl-datepicker-min-time] and [data-vl-datepicker-max-time]: set an earliest and/or latest time(s). The attribute value is the required time. [data-vl-datepicker-disable-date="true"]: hides the datepicker. [data-vl-datepicker-enable-time="true"]: shows the timepicker. [data-vl-datepicker-24hr-time="true"]: displays a 24-hour notation. Warning: do not forget to change the date format to a matching time format when using a timepicker. For example: "H:i" to show time only or "d.m.Y H:i" to show date and time. The datepicker is built with Flatpickr, an accessible and lightweight datepicker plug-in.

Datepicker

Default appearance of a datepicker, the user clicks the calendar icon to select a date.

      
  <label for="datepicker-1" class="vl-form__label">
    Datum evenement (dd.mm.jjjj)
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    
    
    >
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-1"
      name="datepicker-1" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies datum">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies datum</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Datepicker with a formatted date

A datepicker with a custom date format, edit the data-vl-datepicker-format attribute to change the format.

      
  <label for="datepicker-2" class="vl-form__label">
    Datum evenement (jjjj-mm-dd)
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    data-vl-datepicker-format="Y-m-d"
    
    >
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-2"
      name="datepicker-2" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies datum">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies datum</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Datepicker with a preselected date

Add the data-vl-datepicker-selected-date attribute to set a preselected date (highlighted in blue in the calendar).

      
  <label for="datepicker-3" class="vl-form__label">
    Datum evenement (dd.mm.jjjj)
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    
    
    data-vl-datepicker-selected-date="19.04.2022">
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-3"
      name="datepicker-3" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies datum">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies datum</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Datepicker with earliest/latest date

Add the data-vl-datepicker-min-date and/or data-vl-datepicker-max-date attribute(s) to set the earliest and/or latest date(s).

      
  <label for="datepicker-4" class="vl-form__label">
    Datum evenement (jjjj-mm-dd)
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    
    
    data-vl-datepicker-min-date="05.02.2018"data-vl-datepicker-max-date="15.12.2018">
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-4"
      name="datepicker-4" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies datum">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies datum</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Timepicker

Default appearance of a timepicker, click the calendar icon to select a time of day.

      
  <label for="datepicker-5" class="vl-form__label">
    Tijdstip evenement (u:m)
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    data-vl-datepicker-format="H:i"
    
    data-vl-datepicker-enable-time="true"data-vl-datepicker-disable-date="true">
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-5"
      name="datepicker-5" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies tijdstip">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-clock" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies tijdstip</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Timepicker with earliest/latest time

Add the data-vl-datepicker-min-time and/or data-vl-datepicker-max-time attribute(s) to set an earliest and/or latest time(s).

      
  <label for="datepicker-7" class="vl-form__label">
    Tijdstip evenement (u:m)
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    data-vl-datepicker-format="H:i"
    
    data-vl-datepicker-enable-time="true"data-vl-datepicker-disable-date="true"data-vl-datepicker-min-time="09:00"data-vl-datepicker-max-time="14:00">
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-7"
      name="datepicker-7" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies tijdstip">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-clock" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies tijdstip</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Timepicker with AM/PM indication

Set the data-vl-datepicker-24hr-time attribute to false in order to enable the AM and PM buttons.

      
  <label for="datepicker-6" class="vl-form__label">
    Tijdstip evenement (u:m)
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    data-vl-datepicker-format="H:i"
    
    data-vl-datepicker-enable-time="true"data-vl-datepicker-disable-date="true"data-vl-datepicker-24hr-time="false">
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-6"
      name="datepicker-6" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies tijdstip">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-clock" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies tijdstip</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Date- and timepicker

A combination of the date- and timepickers, after selecting a date, the option to select a time appears.

      
  <label for="datepicker-8" class="vl-form__label">
    Datum en tijdstip evenement (dd.mm.jjjj u:m)
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    data-vl-datepicker-format="d.m.Y H:i"
    
    data-vl-datepicker-enable-time="true">
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-8"
      name="datepicker-8" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies datum en tijdstip">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies datum en tijdstip</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Date- and timepicker with a restricted time span

Add the data-vl-datepicker-min-date and/or data-vl-datepicker-max-date attribute(s) to set an earliest and/or latest date(s).

      
  <label for="datepicker-9" class="vl-form__label">
    Datum en tijdstip evenement (dd.mm.jjjj u:m)
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    data-vl-datepicker-format="d.m.Y H:i"
    
    data-vl-datepicker-enable-time="true"data-vl-datepicker-min-time="09:00"data-vl-datepicker-max-time="14:00">
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-9"
      name="datepicker-9" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies datum en tijdstip">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies datum en tijdstip</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Datepicker with alternative visual value

Add the data-vl-datepicker-visual-output attribute to allow for a visually different date format. The actual value of the input, however, will be in the regular format.

      
  <label for="datepicker-10" class="vl-form__label">
    Datum evenement
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    data-vl-datepicker-format="d.m.Y"
    data-vl-datepicker-visual-format="l d M Y"
    >
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-10"
      name="datepicker-10" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies datum">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies datum</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Datepicker with range

Add the data-vl-datepicker-range attribute to allow a date range selector. This will allow the user to choose a start and end day.

      
  <label for="datepicker-11" class="vl-form__label">
    Datum (range)
  </label>
  <div class="vl-input-group vl-datepicker" data-vl-datepicker
    data-vl-datepicker-format="d.m.Y"
    
    data-vl-datepicker-range>
    <input class="vl-input-field vl-input-field--block js-vl-datepicker-input"
      type="text"
      id="datepicker-11"
      name="datepicker-11" />
    <button type="button" name="button"
      class="vl-input-addon js-vl-datepicker-toggle js-vl-tooltip"
      data-vl-tooltip-content="Kies datum">
      <i class="vl-vi vl-vi-calendar" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Kies datum</span>
    </button>
  </div>

Accessibility

Use the label element to inform the user if a specific date format is required, e.g. "dd/mm/yyyy". Never offer the datepicker as the only way to choose or enter a date. Allow the user to choose or enter a date manually as well.
